title: How and where can I apply for the IGNOU July session 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: You go on IGNOU site , there first you will have to registered yourself with mobile no and email id. When you registered once you must remember your id and password. After login in IGNOU you will get all information about courses and their dates for apply.
On the official website -http://www.ignou.ac.in/ link will get activate for july 2020 admission courses Between around last June or july-august.keep a check regularly.
The admission process is fully online. You can go to official website of ignou and apply for fresh admissions. That's all.
